Title: Establishes the veterans' services organization capital support program; appropriation
Summary: Establishes the veterans' services organization capital support program to provide funding to eligible entities for payment of the capital costs of construction, improvement, repairs, rehabilitation, or reconstruction of facilities owned by eligible entities, and for the acquisition of related equipment with a useful life of not less than ten years; appropriates a sum of $10,000,000 therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law, in relation to establishing the veterans' services organization capital support program; and making an appropriation therefor
